eu.geclipse.core
Class Solution

java.lang.Object
  eu.geclipse.core.Solution
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISolution
Direct Known Subclasses:
UISolution
public class Solution
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISolution

Concrete implementation of the ISolution interface. Implementations of ISolution should always extend this class rather than implementing the interface by themselves. This standard implementation is a passive solution so solve() does nothing.

Method Summary
 int getID()
          Get the ID of the solution.
 java.lang.String getText()
          Get a descriptive text that explains the user how to deal with a problem.
 boolean isActive()
          Standard implementation that returns false.
 void solve()
          Standard implementation that does nothing.
